titleStmt.title: The questions concerning liberty, necessity, and chance clearly stated and debated between Dr. Bramhall, Bishop of Derry, and Thomas Hobbes of Malmesbury.
titleStmt.author: Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.
Bramhall, John, 1594-1663.

notesStmt.note: Ending pages mutilated in the filmed copy. Pages 300-348 photographed from Newberry Library copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
